 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּגַר‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==be exhausted, faint== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּגַר‎</span> derived species ***tear down, destroy***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pagru, body, corpse;***</u></abbr> Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּגֶר‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פַּגְרָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פגר‎</span>; Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פאגרא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M § 89</sup>); — ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּגְּרוּ מִן‎</span> ***they were too faint*** to go, etc. [[1Sam.30.10|1Sam 30:10]]; [[1Sam.30.21|1Sam 30:21]].
